com.verygoodsecurity.vgscollect.view.material

Class TextInputFieldLayout

  • com.verygoodsecurity.vgscollect.view.material.TextInputFieldLayout
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    VGSTextInputLayout

    public class TextInputFieldLayout

    An abstract class that provide floating label when the hint is hidden due to user inputting text.
